testcase.name: bookRoundTripFlight
testcase.system-out: ================================================== TEST STARTED : BOOK ROUND TRIP FLIGHT ================================================== ---------- STEP 1 : DATA.PROPERTIES FILE LOADED... ---------- ---------- STEP 2 : OPEN APPLICATION ---------- Browser launched successfully Navigated to application URL ---------- STEP 3 : CLOSE INITIAL POPUPS ---------- Login popup closed Chat popup closed Initial popups closed successfully Popups closed ---------- STEP 4 : LOGIN / SIGNUP ---------- login/Signup Login button clicked switched to iframe Google Sign-in clicked Switched to child window Email entered: abc@gmail.com Child window closed Switched back to main window Login popup closed Popups closed after login/signup ---------- STEP 5 : CURRENCY SELECTION ---------- Selecting currency from auto-suggestion list Scrolling to Click on currency dropdown Clicking on currency dropdown Typing currency in search box: INR Number of currency suggestions displayed: 1 Currency suggestion found: Indian Rupee INR Currency selected successfully: INR ---------- STEP 6 : FLIGHT BOOKING FLOW ---------- Source city selected: Pune Airport Destination city selected: Hyderabad Begumpet Airport Cities selected Departure date selected: Tue Feb 17 2026 Return date field activated Return date selected: Sun Mar 01 2026 Dates selected Starting traveller selection flow Traveller widget opened Traveller widget opened Adults = 3 Traveller widget opened Adults selected: 3 Selected 3 adults Traveller selection applied Traveller details applied successfully ================================================== TEST COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY ==================================================
